players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Sad to hear about Diana. We should focus on finding the mafia quickly to keep the town safe."
You: "I have important information: Bob is the mafia. We need to act fast and vote him out to protect the town."
Charlie: "Alice, why are you so quick to accuse Bob? We need to hear from everyone before jumping to conclusions."
Bob: "Accusations this early seem rushed. Let's gather more info before voting. Alice, what makes you sure I'm mafia?"
You: "Alice investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is the mafia. We can't afford to waste time—voting him out now is our best chance to save the town."
Charlie: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of Diana? That doesn't make sense for night 1 strategy."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Sad to hear about Diana. We should focus on finding the mafia quickly to keep the town safe."
Alice: "I have important information: Bob is the mafia. We need to act fast and vote him out to protect the town."
Charlie: "Alice, why are you so quick to accuse Bob? We need to hear from everyone before jumping to conclusions."
You: "Accusations this early seem rushed. Let's gather more info before voting. Alice, what makes you sure I'm mafia?"
Alice: "Alice investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is the mafia. We can't afford to waste time—voting him out now is our best chance to save the town."
Charlie: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of Diana? That doesn't make sense for night 1 strategy."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
